display_long_description:
🛣️**Become a thief and level up your career in a highly interactive open world!**

Drive around  neighborhoods to look for the best mansions to rob. Visit different facilities, sell the goods at the pawnshop or look for new jobs in your garage.
[media]


🚗 **Steal & drive cars, disassemble parts and customize your ride!**

From pick-ups to sports cars! Hijack rides and run away from the police. Drive around the neighborhoods, store loot in your trunk and customize your wheels.

[media]

🔒**Climb the walls, smash windows, hack computers & lockpick doors**

Disassemble house alarms, crack safes and look for hideouts. Do whatever is necessary to steal and sell the most valuable loot.

[media]

👮**Avoid the tenants, watch out for the security guards & cameras**

Plan ahead, discover the tenants’ routines and make sure they are not home. Outwit the guards and sneak around security cameras

[media]
